name: Gravobot
description:
Gravobot is a 2D gravity puzzle adventure in which the titular Gravobot has been sent by the Space Queen to deliver flower samples from a new planet. However, Gravobot’s power to manipulate the gravity of special objects with their trusty gravity ball ends up accidentally splitting the planet apart before their very eyes!

Join Gravobot as they use their power in order to make their way to the planet’s center and pull it all back together!

This game requires the use of a keyboard and mouse or touchscreen.
